Text:
Hi can any body tell me why this is happening please,

i put the update 6.60 in the update file in game folder then i disconnect my psp, when i go to update it from storage media i keep getting NO APPLICABLE UPDATE DATA WAS FOUND. does anyone know why that is?
do you have an official 6.60 firmware in your root directory Speedy?
I put the fimeware what was in this file, i cant update because my psp not connect to the internet
